extensionDescription.message: A browser extension that applies some tweaks to Moodle.

helpURL.description: URL used as the help URL.

helpTitle.message: You can hover over buttons for brief explanations or click this button to open the help page.
helpTitle.description: This is shown when hovering over the help button.

exampleDomain.description: Example of a domain, should not actually show up.

domainNotMoodle.description: Shown after a domain is determined to be not Moodle.

domainOnTitle.message:
Click to stop running the extension on this website!
Don't forget to refresh any open Moodle pages.
domainOnTitle.description: Title/Tooltip shown when the extension is running on the shown domain.

domainOffTitle.message:
Click to start running the extension on this domain!
Please grant permissions, if requested.
Don't forget to refresh any open Moodle pages.
domainOffTitle.description: Title/Tooltip shown when the extension is not running on the shown domain.

domainNotMoodleTitle.message: This site isn't a valid Moodle 3.x environment, the extension run here!
domainNotMoodleTitle.description: Title/Tooltip shown when the extension is not able to run on the domain because it's not a Moodle environment.

singlePageBooks.description: Text shown on the toggle for the single page books feature.

singlePageDicts.description: Text shown on the toggle for the single page dictionaries feature.

middleClickFix.description: Text shown on the toggle for the middle-click fix feature.

popupLinkBlocker.description: Text shown on the toggle for the popup blocker feature.

sessionKeepAlive.description: Text shown on the toggle for the session keep-alive feature.

singlePageBooksTitle.message:
This module combines Moodle's multi-page books into a single long page, with the TOC scrolling you around it.
WARNING: Loading large books may take a little while, it probably hasn't crashed while loading.
singlePageBooksTitle.description: Text shown when hovering over the toggle for the single page books feature.

singlePageDictsTitle.message: This module automatically displays all pages in a Moodle dictionary.
singlePageDictsTitle.description: Text shown when hovering over the toggle for the single page dictionaries feature.

middleClickFixTitle.message: This module lets you middle click on certain external links without having to click on the link a second time on the redirect page.
middleClickFixTitle.description: Text shown when hovering over the toggle for the middle-click fix feature.

popupLinkBlockerTitle.message: This module forces any links that would normally open in a small popup box to be opened as a normal tab.
popupLinkBlockerTitle.description: Text shown when hovering over the toggle for the popup blocker feature.

sessionKeepAliveTitle.message: This module prevents logging out while idle by occasionally sending a request to the site's home page.
sessionKeepAliveTitle.description: Text shown when hovering over the toggle for the session keep-alive feature.
